instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a mobile-first fintech app for West Africa. Prioritize legibility, large touch targets, and high contrast. The aesthetic should be 'Modern African Fintech' - professional but warm.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_setup: Use the provided color palette. Ensure 'primary' is mapped to Emerald-900 and 'secondary' to Stone-100 in tailwind.config.js.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_strategy: Use the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard. On mobile, stack everything vertically with generous spacing (gap-6).
instructions_to_main_agent.component_overrides: Customize Shadcn components. Remove default heavy shadows. Use borders and subtle background colors to define hierarchy.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts (via Shadcn Charts) for the wallet history. Style them with the primary green and accent blue.
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA contrast. Use 'data-testid' on all interactive elements.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
